description:
Product Description  





 






 

 Indulge in Luxurious Comfort with Our Chenille Oversized Armchair - 34" Wide, Ultra-Plush & Perfect for Relaxing in Style!   Transform your living space into a cozy retreat with our Chenille Oversized Armchair. Designed for ultimate relaxation, this 34" wide armchair features sumptuous chenille upholstery and high-density foam cushioning, offering unparalleled comfort whether you're reading, napping, or simply unwinding.  



 Product Features:      Color: Beige     Fabric: chenille      Filling: High-density foam     Dimensions: 29.7"D x 33.9"W x 34.3"H     Weight: 40.7lbs     Weight capacity: 300 lbs     










 
 Soft & Cozy Chenille Fabric   Luxurious chenille fabric offers cloud-like softness with durable, pill-resistant texture. The plush upholstery provides year-round comfort while maintaining easy-care stain resistance for daily relaxation.  


 
 High Resilience Foam   Our high-resilience foam core delivers the perfect balance of softness and support, gently conforming to your body while maintaining its shape. The breathable construction keeps you cool, while durable materials ensure long-lasting comfort.  


 
 Removable Wide Backrest   Detachable wide backrest offers customizable comfort with ergonomic support. The removable design allows easy cleaning and versatile placement, enhancing both function and style.  


 
 Pillow-shaped Armrest   Plush pillow-shaped armrests provide cloud-like comfort, with high-resilience foam that molds to your arms for ergonomic support. The generously padded design enhances relaxation while adding a stylish touch.

feature_bullets: Stylish & Modern Design: Elevate your space with the oversized accent chair, featuring a sleek, arched backrest, curved armrests, and clean lines for a contemporary yet elegant look. Perfect for living rooms, bedrooms, or studies, this chair blends modern aesthetics with timeless comfort. The plush chenille fabric adds a touch of luxury, making it a stylish centerpiece in any room

Ultra-Comfortable Seating: Designed for all-day relaxation, this 33.9" W x 29.7" D x 34.3" H comfortable armchair is padded with high-density sponge in the armrests and backrest for optimal support. The spring cushion seat ensures long-lasting comfort, while the generous 26.8" W x 18.9" D seat size accommodates all body types. Whether reading, working, or lounging in this perfectly proportioned chair, you'll enjoy cloud-like comfort with every sit

Durable & Sturdy Construction: Built to last, this reading accent chair combines wooden and iron frame for maximum stability and durability, supporting up to 300 lbs. The reinforced structure prevents wobbling, while the premium chenille fabric resists wear and tear. A perfect blend of strength and style, this chair is ideal for everyday use

Soft & Skin-Friendly Chenille Fabric: Indulge in the ultra-soft, skin-friendly chenille upholstery that feels smooth and cozy to the touch. The high-quality fabric is breathable and easy to clean, maintaining its plush look over time. Designed for both comfort and durability, this living room chair’s premium material ensures a luxurious seating experience that enhances your home’s aesthetic

Easy Assembly & Reliable Support: Arrives with clear instructions —assembly takes just 15-20 minutes! Backed by dependable after-sales service, we ensure a hassle-free experience. Enjoy quick setup and long-lasting comfort with this must-have modern armchair
